list.name: Changes
list.comment: Add backend APIs, database schema, and seed data for villa booking system

task.summary: Default task

Add custom pricing logic for villas, update BookingCalendar and VillaDetailsPage integration
- Implement date-specific custom pricing with priority over standard pricing logic. - Refactor price calculation in VillaDetailsPage to use new custom pricing logic. - Enhance BookingCalendar to display custom pricing labels, tooltips, and styling. - Update mock data with diverse custom pricing scenarios and add `CustomPricing` type to types.

Add property details section to VillaDetailsPage and enhance ListingsPage villa info display
- Add property details (bedrooms, beds, bathrooms, max guests) with styled icons in VillaDetailsPage. - Update ListingsPage to display bedroom and bathroom data alongside max guest capacity. - Extend villa types and mock data with new attributes for bedrooms, beds, and bathrooms.

Add house rules section to VillaDetailsPage and update villa types and mock data
- Add styled house rules section with icons in `VillaDetailsPage`. - Extend `Villa` type to include `HouseRules` and implement types for individual rules. - Update mock data to specify house rules for all villas. - Ensure responsive design for house rules grid and card layout.

Refactor `amenities` structure across villa pages and enhance display logic
- Replace flat `amenities` array with categorized `VillaAmenities` structure in villa types and mock data. - Update VillaDetailsPage to display amenities in categorized sections with styled titles. - Use helper functions to streamline amenities processing and ensure reusability across ListingsPage and HomePage. - Adjust villa card components to normalize and display top amenities efficiently.

Add "Listings" tab and menu item for villa navigation
- Add "Listings" option with icon in DrawerMenu for quick access. - Include "Listings" tab in BottomTabNavigation for both tenants and homeowners.

Implement advanced filtering system for villa listings
- Add SearchBar and FilterPanel components for dynamic filters. - Create `applyFilters` utility for filtering villas based on price, location, amenities, guests, and more. - Refactor ListingsPage state to use centralized filter logic with improved UI/UX.

Enhance VillaDetailsPage amenities and house rules sections
- Add `getAmenityIcon` helper to display icons alongside amenities. - Introduce styles for enhanced amenity categorization and streamlined list display. - Refactor house rules layout with consistent styling and icon alignment. - Improve overall readability and UX for both sections.

Add VillaImageGallery component to enhance villa image experience
- Introduce VillaImageGallery component with Swiper integration for responsive image slideshows. - Replace static villa image display in VillaDetailsPage with Carousel. - Update mock data to include additional images for variety in showcases. - Add Swiper and associated dependencies to package.json for advanced carousel functionality. - Extend styles and logic to handle broken images gracefully and improve visual consistency.

Refactor code formatting and improve style consistency in VillaDetailsPage
- Use consistent indentation and spacing for better readability. - Adjust various style properties for enhanced layout and alignment. - Streamline amenity list display with improved wrapping and spacing. - Update property detail and button styles for visual clarity and usability.

Add price range slider to FilterPanel for improved filtering
- Replace numeric input fields for price with a dual-thumb slider. - Introduce `@radix-ui/react-slider` for precise price range selection. - Update styles for slider, price display, and container for better UX. - Adjust filter reset logic to include slider defaults. - Enhance local state management for dynamic price updates.

Update VillaDetailsPage layout styles for responsive design improvements
- Replace grid layout with flexible wrapping for better responsiveness. - Adjust column styles with width, maxWidth, and flex properties. - Enhance house rules layout with row display and wrapping for better alignment.

Add villa details for listings
- Add `index.txt` files for multiple villas, including detailed descriptions, rates, amenities, and facilities. - Update villa information directory in `public/assets/villas/`. - Ensure all villas include formatted data, such as pool information, guest limits, rates, and kitchen utilities for consistent display. - Maintain file structure for easy integration with existing filtering and display systems.

Refactor layout styles and update villa mock data for consistency
- Adjust layout across multiple pages for improved responsiveness, replacing flex layout with grid in VillaDetailsPage and ListingsPage. - Refactor indentation in HomePage for consistent code formatting. - Update villa mock data names for clarity and standardization. - Modify featured status of select villas in mock data to reflect updates.

Refactor styles for consistency and improve responsiveness on VillaDetailsPage and HomePage
- Adjust margin and spacing styles across components for cleaner layout. - Update grid column size in HomePage for better responsiveness. - Modify padding in villa image display for improved aspect ratio handling.

Update amenity list layout on VillaDetailsPage for improved responsiveness
- Replace flex layout with grid for better wrapping and spacing. - Adjust grid columns using `auto-fit` for dynamic resizing.

Add NewBookingPage and BookingsContext for booking management
- Introduce `BookingsContext` for state management, including functions to add and update bookings. - Add `NewBookingPage` with UI for booking details, form validation, and payment processing. - Integrate `NewBookingPage` into App routing for tenant booking flow. - Update `TenantDashboard` to fetch bookings dynamically using `BookingsContext`. - Refactor `App` to wrap content with `BookingsProvider`.
Refactor success modal styles in NewBookingPage for consistency and responsiveness

Add BookingDetailPage, BookingListPage, and VillasContext for booking management
- Introduce `BookingDetailPage` to display detailed information about tenant bookings. - Add `BookingListPage` for viewing and managing tenant booking summaries. - Create `VillasContext` for managing villa-related operations, including fetching villa details and available villas. - Enhance tenant flow with dynamic booking and villa data integration.

Add ScrollToTop component and implement back button in MainLayout
- Introduce `ScrollToTop` component to ensure navigation scroll resets, with exclusions for specific paths. - Implement a dynamic back button in `MainLayout` header for improved navigation. - Refactor `VillaDetailsPage` to remove redundant scroll-to-top logic. - Update development server script to enable `--host` option for local debugging.

Refactor VillaDetailsPage styles and update image gallery layout for responsiveness
- Standardize margin and spacing in inline styles for consistency. - Introduce responsive wrapping layout in the image gallery using `motion.div` and CSS media queries. - Add additional image sections for improved viewing experience on different screen sizes.
Refactor NewBookingPage to standardize indentation and spacing for improved code readability and consistency
Refactor NewBookingPage to standardize indentation and spacing for improved code readability and consistency

Add AmenitiesContext and Villa Management pages
- Introduce `AmenitiesContext` for managing amenities state and operations (add, update, remove). - Add `VillaManagementListPage` for filtering and managing villas based on status and featured state. - Add `VillaManagementPage` with detailed forms for creating and editing villa information, including amenities, pricing, and house rules. - Implement localStorage integration to persist amenity state in `AmenitiesContext`.

Integrate VillasContext into villa pages and refactor styles
- Replace `mockVillas` with `VillasContext` across `VillaDetailsPage`, `ListingsPage`, and `HomePage`. - Use `useVillas` to fetch and filter villas dynamically. - Update villa management to create inactive villas by default and add them via `VillasContext`. - Enhance button and image gallery styles for improved consistency and appearance.

Refactor NewBookingPage to use NumericInput component for number of guests input
- Replace custom number of guests input logic with reusable `NumericInput` component. - Add `NumericInput` component to streamline number input with built-in validation and styling. - Remove redundant styles and logic from `NewBookingPage`.

Integrate Radix UI Checkbox into VillaManagementPage and improve location selection
- Add `@radix-ui/react-checkbox` for improved checkbox rendering and replace existing logic with Radix components. - Implement custom dropdown for location selection, including predefined location suggestions. - Refactor button attributes in `NumericInput` to use explicit `type="button"` for better clarity. - Update inline styles in `VillaManagementPage` for compact and consistent layout across sections. - Update dependency in `package-lock.json` for Radix UI integration.

Refactor villa pages and components for consistent styles and enhanced pricing features
- Standardize margin and spacing across villa pages (`VillaManagementListPage`, `ListingsPage`, and `VillaDetailsPage`) for uniform layout. - Update `VillaDetailsPage` pricing section with additional "Half Day" pricing and improved styling. - Replace inline images with styled `div` containers for improved rendering in `VillaManagementListPage`. - Extend `NumericInput` to support customizable steps and additional styles, updating related usages in villa management forms. - Add consistent grid layout for pricing fields in `VillaManagementPage`.

Enhance FilterPanel with Radix Select for location and integrate AmenitiesContext
- Replace custom location input with `@radix-ui/react-select`, incorporating predefined locations and custom input functionality. - Leverage `AmenitiesContext` for dynamic amenity handling, removing redundant amenity logic. - Add state management for the location dropdown and reset location on filters clear. - Update BookingListPage image and layout styles for improved visual consistency.

Add cancel button to LoginPage and integrate date selection with calendar in NewBookingPage
- Introduce `Cancel` button on LoginPage with navigation logic to redirect users to the previous page or home. - Enhance NewBookingPage with a `BookingCalendar` component for date selection, including unavailable dates handling. - Add dynamic calendar visibility based on date pre-selection in NewBookingPage. - Refactor NewBookingPage to improve state management for check-in and check-out dates.

Add BookingDetailPage and BookingListPage for enhanced booking management
- Introduce `BookingDetailPage` with comprehensive booking and villa detail display, dynamic styles, and user-specific actions. - Add `BookingListPage` with role-based booking filtering, improved layout, and empty state handling. - Include responsive styling for both pages to enhance usability across devices.

Remove `BookingDetailPage` and `BookingListPage` from tenant directory
- Deleted `BookingDetailPage.tsx` and `BookingListPage.tsx` to consolidate pages into a shared structure. - Updated related logic to ensure `BookingListPage.tsx` under `common` directory supports role-based booking filtering.

Replace native selects with Radix Select in VillaManagementListPage and FilterPanel; add UserContext for user management
- Updated `VillaManagementListPage` to use `@radix-ui/react-select` for status and featured filters, improving dropdown styles and usability. - Enhanced `FilterPanel` with Radix Select, adding optimized styles and custom functionality for location filtering. - Added `UserContext` for managing user states and actions, such as searching, filtering by role, fetching by ID, and CRUD operations.

Prevent user-initiated zoom across all devices and input scenarios
- Block pinch, double-tap, keyboard, and wheel zoom actions in `main.tsx` using event listeners. - Update `index.html` with restrictive `viewport` meta tag to limit zoom capabilities. - Apply CSS rules in `layout.css` to disable zoom, touch gestures, and overscroll while keeping certain areas text-selectable.

Update BookingListPage layout styles for improved responsiveness
- Adjust item containers to use `flexGrow` and `minWidth` for better scaling and spacing. - Add `gap` to wrapped booking items for consistent alignment.

Enhance villa pages with Radix icons, update styles, and introduce edit functionality for VillaManagementPage
- Replace emoji icons with modern Radix icons in `VillaDetailsPage` and `VillaManagementPage` for consistent styling. - Add edit route and functionality to `VillaManagementPage`, enabling villa updates along with confirmation and success dialogs. - Refactor layout and spacing for several components, including `VillaDetailsPage` and `MainLayout`, for improved rendering. - Adjust context functions and hooks to support villa editing.

Add base path handling for Vite config and routing
- Introduce `getBasePath` and `getRouterBasePath` utility functions for base path management. - Update `vite.config.ts` with base path and custom build directory. - Configure `Router` in `App.tsx` to use the base path for proper routing.

Add `AssetImage` component and unify image paths with `getAssetUrl`
- Introduce `AssetImage` component to automatically handle base paths in image sources. - Replace raw image paths across pages and components with `getAssetUrl` for consistent base path handling.

Add `AssetImage` component and unify image paths with `getAssetUrl`
- Introduce `AssetImage` component to automatically handle base paths in image sources. - Replace raw image paths across pages and components with `getAssetUrl` for consistent base path handling.

Add ProfilePage with motion animations and update Vite config, routing, and main logo
- Introduce `ProfilePage` with Framer Motion animations and user information display, including logout functionality. - Update `vite.config.ts` to adjust base path and build output directory. - Replace SVG logo in `MainLayout` with a new PNG logo for consistent branding. - Add `ProfilePage` route and integrate it into `TopNavigation` for all user roles. - Update `colors.ts` by refining the primary color.

Update BottomTabNavigation to include Profile tab and replace icons
- Replace existing Messages tab with Profile tab for both user and admin roles. - Add `AvatarIcon` to admin Profile tab for better differentiation.

Move `NewBookingPage` to common directory and add guest details form
- Relocate `NewBookingPage.tsx` from `tenant` to `common` directory for shared usage across roles. - Add guest details form including name, email, and phone number for non-authenticated bookings. - Update `UserContext` to handle guest user creation when booking is made by a non-authenticated user.

Add `design.ts` for reusable design tokens and refactor villa pages with improved styles
- Introduce `design.ts` utility file to centralize typography, spacing, shadows, transitions, and common component styles. - Refactor `VillaDetailsPage` and `ListingsPage` to utilize new design tokens for consistent styling. - Remove inline styles and replace them with `design.ts` utilities for better maintainability and readability.

Add `useScrollbarWidth` and `usePreventBodyScroll` hooks to manage layout scrolling and integrate with `FilterPanel`
- Introduce `useScrollbarWidth` to calculate and store scrollbar width as a CSS variable for consistent layout adjustments. - Add `usePreventBodyScroll` hook to prevent body scroll when `FilterPanel` is open and manage padding for layout preservation. - Update `FilterPanel` to use `usePreventBodyScroll` and improve modal interaction by handling outside clicks.

Add `CLAUDE.md` for development guidance and enhance ListingsPage with date selection modal
- Introduce `CLAUDE.md` containing detailed project setup, architecture, commands, and design patterns for contributors. - Enhance `ListingsPage` by integrating date selection modal using Radix Dialog for selecting booking dates. - Implement unavailable date handling, dynamic date selection, and navigation to booking page based on selected villa and dates.

Add `HelpSupportPage`, `NotificationsPage`, and `ReportsPage` with modular components and enhanced interactions
- Introduce `HelpSupportPage` featuring categorized FAQs, category filtering, and contact options with Radix icons. - Add `NotificationsPage` allowing filtering by type or unread status, marking notifications as read, and deleting notifications. - Create `ReportsPage` with role-based access control, chart data preparation, and responsive reporting features.
Move mock data from `mockData.ts` to `data.ts` for better organization
Add IntelliJ IDEA project configuration file (`workspace.xml`) to repository
Add `CLAUDE.md` with guidelines for development and project setup
Add backend APIs, database schema, and seed data for villa booking system

MESSAGE.value:
Enhance FilterPanel with Radix Select for location and integrate AmenitiesContext
- Replace custom location input with `@radix-ui/react-select`, incorporating predefined locations and custom input functionality. - Leverage `AmenitiesContext` for dynamic amenity handling, removing redundant amenity logic. - Add state management for the location dropdown and reset location on filters clear. - Update BookingListPage image and layout styles for improved visual consistency.

Add cancel button to LoginPage and integrate date selection with calendar in NewBookingPage
- Introduce `Cancel` button on LoginPage with navigation logic to redirect users to the previous page or home. - Enhance NewBookingPage with a `BookingCalendar` component for date selection, including unavailable dates handling. - Add dynamic calendar visibility based on date pre-selection in NewBookingPage. - Refactor NewBookingPage to improve state management for check-in and check-out dates.

Add BookingDetailPage and BookingListPage for enhanced booking management
- Introduce `BookingDetailPage` with comprehensive booking and villa detail display, dynamic styles, and user-specific actions. - Add `BookingListPage` with role-based booking filtering, improved layout, and empty state handling. - Include responsive styling for both pages to enhance usability across devices.

Remove `BookingDetailPage` and `BookingListPage` for tenant; migrate booking management features to `common` components
- Deleted `BookingDetailPage` and `BookingListPage` from tenant-specific directory due to consolidation. - Centralized booking management logic into `BookingListPage` under `common` with role-based filtering and enhanced structure. - Improved maintainability by reducing duplication and ensuring unified booking management across user roles.

Remove `BookingDetailPage` and `BookingListPage` from tenant directory
- Deleted `BookingDetailPage.tsx` and `BookingListPage.tsx` to consolidate pages into a shared structure. - Updated related logic to ensure `BookingListPage.tsx` under `common` directory supports role-based booking filtering.

Replace native selects with Radix Select in VillaManagementListPage and FilterPanel; add UserContext for user management
- Updated `VillaManagementListPage` to use `@radix-ui/react-select` for status and featured filters, improving dropdown styles and usability. - Enhanced `FilterPanel` with Radix Select, adding optimized styles and custom functionality for location filtering. - Added `UserContext` for managing user states and actions, such as searching, filtering by role, fetching by ID, and CRUD operations.

Prevent user-initiated zoom across all devices and input scenarios
- Block pinch, double-tap, keyboard, and wheel zoom actions in `main.tsx` using event listeners. - Update `index.html` with restrictive `viewport` meta tag to limit zoom capabilities. - Apply CSS rules in `layout.css` to disable zoom, touch gestures, and overscroll while keeping certain areas text-selectable.

Update BookingListPage layout styles for improved responsiveness
- Adjust item containers to use `flexGrow` and `minWidth` for better scaling and spacing. - Add `gap` to wrapped booking items for consistent alignment.

Enable villa editing with new route and dialog enhancements
- Introduced `/villas/edit/:id` route for villa editing in `App.tsx`. - Enhanced `VillaManagementPage` with support for both new villa creation and editing, adding logic for loading and updating existing villas. - Added confirmation and success dialogs for villa creation and editing actions. - Updated styles and functionality in `HomeownerDashboard` and `VillaManagementListPage` for consistency.

Enhance villa pages with Radix icons, update styles, and introduce edit functionality for VillaManagementPage
- Replace emoji icons with modern Radix icons in `VillaDetailsPage` and `VillaManagementPage` for consistent styling. - Add edit route and functionality to `VillaManagementPage`, enabling villa updates along with confirmation and success dialogs. - Refactor layout and spacing for several components, including `VillaDetailsPage` and `MainLayout`, for improved rendering. - Adjust context functions and hooks to support villa editing.

Add base path handling for Vite config and routing
- Introduce `getBasePath` and `getRouterBasePath` utility functions for base path management. - Update `vite.config.ts` with base path and custom build directory. - Configure `Router` in `App.tsx` to use the base path for proper routing.

Update asset handling to use `getAssetUrl` across villa pages
- Replace direct image path references with `getAssetUrl` utility to handle base path adjustments dynamically. - Ensure consistent asset loading on `BookingListPage`, `BookingDetailPage`, `NewBookingPage`, `HomePage`, `ListingsPage`, and more. - Add `getAssetUrl` function to `basePath.ts` for streamlined base path handling of assets.

Add `AssetImage` component and unify image paths with `getAssetUrl`
- Introduce `AssetImage` component to automatically handle base paths in image sources. - Replace raw image paths across pages and components with `getAssetUrl` for consistent base path handling.

Add ProfilePage with motion animations and update Vite config, routing, and main logo
- Introduce `ProfilePage` with Framer Motion animations and user information display, including logout functionality. - Update `vite.config.ts` to adjust base path and build output directory. - Replace SVG logo in `MainLayout` with a new PNG logo for consistent branding. - Add `ProfilePage` route and integrate it into `TopNavigation` for all user roles. - Update `colors.ts` by refining the primary color.

Update BottomTabNavigation to include Profile tab and replace icons
- Replace existing Messages tab with Profile tab for both user and admin roles. - Add `AvatarIcon` to admin Profile tab for better differentiation.

Move `NewBookingPage` to common directory and add guest details form
- Relocate `NewBookingPage.tsx` from `tenant` to `common` directory for shared usage across roles. - Add guest details form including name, email, and phone number for non-authenticated bookings. - Update `UserContext` to handle guest user creation when booking is made by a non-authenticated user.

Remove unused `AuthContext` from Villa pages and improve card hover interactions
- Eliminate `AuthContext` usage from `VillaDetailsPage` and `ListingsPage` to clean up unused dependencies. - Update hover styles for villa cards in `ListingsPage` with smoother transitions and improved shadows for better visual feedback.

Add `design.ts` for reusable design tokens and refactor villa pages with improved styles
- Introduce `design.ts` utility file to centralize typography, spacing, shadows, transitions, and common component styles. - Refactor `VillaDetailsPage` and `ListingsPage` to utilize new design tokens for consistent styling. - Remove inline styles and replace them with `design.ts` utilities for better maintainability and readability.

Add `useScrollbarWidth` and `usePreventBodyScroll` hooks to manage layout scrolling and integrate with `FilterPanel`
- Introduce `useScrollbarWidth` to calculate and store scrollbar width as a CSS variable for consistent layout adjustments. - Add `usePreventBodyScroll` hook to prevent body scroll when `FilterPanel` is open and manage padding for layout preservation. - Update `FilterPanel` to use `usePreventBodyScroll` and improve modal interaction by handling outside clicks.

Add `CLAUDE.md` for development guidance and enhance ListingsPage with date selection modal
- Introduce `CLAUDE.md` containing detailed project setup, architecture, commands, and design patterns for contributors. - Enhance `ListingsPage` by integrating date selection modal using Radix Dialog for selecting booking dates. - Implement unavailable date handling, dynamic date selection, and navigation to booking page based on selected villa and dates.

Add `HelpSupportPage`, `NotificationsPage`, and `ReportsPage` with modular components and enhanced interactions
- Introduce `HelpSupportPage` featuring categorized FAQs, category filtering, and contact options with Radix icons. - Add `NotificationsPage` allowing filtering by type or unread status, marking notifications as read, and deleting notifications. - Create `ReportsPage` with role-based access control, chart data preparation, and responsive reporting features.
Move mock data from `mockData.ts` to `data.ts` for better organization
Add IntelliJ IDEA project configuration file (`workspace.xml`) to repository
Add `CLAUDE.md` with guidelines for development and project setup
Add backend APIs, database schema, and seed data for villa booking system

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Add backend APIs, database schema, and seed data for villa booking system
